item.title: Changelog
item.description: This documents the changes made to the academic theme to make this website work when upgrading from Hugo v.0.47 and theme version… unknown. A couple back, for sure. The upgrade for this website was performed on 12-19-2018. Removed Weibo sharing icon in /layouts/partials/share in the theme directory. Changed footer in layouts/partials/footer_section.html Re-did config.toml line-by-line, disabled night/day mode. Created slides and docs based on the exampleSite folder, including creating the directory /assets/css/reveal_custom.
